answers.answer: Obesity, heavy smoker, constantly tired can be symptoms of diabetes, cardiac, and/or circulatory issues. You need to drag your father to a doctor before its too late.Also, he cannot continue to drive a car, in fact he should be forbidden. If he doesn't listen to you call your local law enforcement and have them come out and talk with him before he injures himself or, worse yet, causes death to an innocent party.
Thanks for all of your help. I've finally convinced my dad to go and see a doctor. He can be so stubborn!Thanks again.James.
That's very good news! We wish your father well.

question: I am very worried about my father's health recently. He has begun to feel constantly tired and has even fallen asleep at the wheel, at which I have had to wake him. He is 51 yrs old, quite overweight and is a fairly heavy smoker.My older sister thinks that this is perhaps a symptom of diabetes. If so I would be grateful if someone could assist me on this matter.
